name: @sakuraapi/api
description: MongoDB and TypeScript MEAN Stack Framework for NodeJS

scripts.build: rm -rf lib/ ; tsc && rsync -r --exclude=*.ts spec/ lib/spec
scripts.coverage: npm run docker:compose-test && npm run build && istanbul cover --include-all-sources node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js && docker-compose down && (open coverage/lcov-report/index.html || echo '')
scripts.doc:serve: nodemon --config nodemon.typedoc.json -e ts --exec 'npm run doc:generate && npm run http-server docs/ -- -a localhost -c-1'
scripts.docker:compose-test: (docker volume prune -f || echo "skipped docker volume prune") ; docker-compose up -d --remove-orphans
scripts.lint: npm run build && npm run lint:code && npm run lint:tests
scripts.lint:code: echo 'CODE LINT' ; npm run tslint -- -t stylish -c tslint.json -p tsconfig.json
scripts.lint:tests: echo 'TEST LINT' ; npm run tslint -- -t stylish -c tslint.spec.json -p tsconfig.json
scripts.prepublish: npm test && npm run nsp check
scripts.start: nodemon --exec "npm run build; echo build done"
scripts.test: npm run docker:compose-test && npm run build && ((npm run jasmine && npm run say:pass) || npm run say:fail) && docker-compose down
scripts.test:db: npm run docker:compose-test && npm run build && ((npm run jasmine && npm run say:pass) || npm run say:fail)

author: Jean-Pierre E. Poveda
